title: Ticket #1286: shadow born w/a security session to the schedd
description:
When the schedd creates a shadow, that shadow then immediately has to turn around and negotiate a security session with the schedd, which can be a fair amount of work on a fully loaded schedd. Instead it may be better to pass the information to the shadow such that when it is born a security session already exists.

This should alleviate some issues where the shadow will exit if is can not negotiate the session within a given time-frame.
remarks:
After further investigation it was discovered that this is definitely sub-optimal, but it's not a major performance concern. Other tickets will be written to address those concerns.

No longer an issue re #1375
